Text.Page:
The argons are practically sharing a campfire with us! We've got to do something.

In Kaiator, they always teach us, "Strike first! Strike last!" That's never a bad strategy.

Start with a "strike first" against the kalashes, and gather some intel if you can.

So the argons are trying to get something from Saleron, just as Killian was? That old, buried god must have something everyone wants, eh?

Better Saleron than me, I guess. And I bet those argons weren't expecting you, .

I've heard of you,

And I know you can take out many, many more argons.
